panels.title: number of bytes transmitted by the interface (Mpssnd)
number of bytes received by the interface (Mpsrec)
number of packets transmitted by the interface (pkops)
number of packets received by the interface (pkips)
Upper layers of the TCP/IP stack
number of packets transmitted by TCP (tcpo)
number of packets received by TCP (tcpi)
number of datagrams transmitted by UDP (udpo)
number of datagrams received by UDP (udpi)
number of packets transmitted by IP (ipo)
number of packets received by IP (ipi)
number of packets delivered to higher layers by IP (deliv)
number of packets forwarded by IP (forward)
